website_summaries.verdict: This pop-up, folding sun shade has an extremely flexible frame, so it's easier to fold for storage.
pros: Offers a good amount of coverage
cons: Metal frame is flexible for collapsing purposes, but some have difficulty keeping it in place

customer_reviews.title: Keeps black interior cool
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2015 Mazda CX5 very well. It's lightweight and sets up easily. It folds up just as easily. I love this things. It's saved my legs from burning on the black leather seats during the summer. When not in use, I fold it up, stuff it back in the little carrying bag, and slide it between the passenger seat and the middle console.
customer_reviews.author: GFam

customer_reviews.title: Too small for Lexus SUV, but easy company to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to be used in a Lexus RX350, and it was about 2 inches too short to stay up, even with the use of the visors. If it weren't for that, I would have kept it. It was nice and lightweight, easy to fold up (ok, maybe not easy to fold back into that nice neat circle it came in, but I could fold it down enough to stuff between the seats), and certainly blocked the light. It's frustrating that seemingly none of the sunshades that call themselves "jumbo" are tall enough to accommodate my 32" tall windshield. The company was extremely easy to get the refund from, so thank you for that!
customer_reviews.author: MommyKel

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and little cost.........................................
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunshield well made and perfect for my front car window ordering in the standard size; I have a Buick LeSabre. Found sunshield very easy to open and close just by twisting as shown and coming with a nice pouch to store in. Not sure which side faces outward, the blue or the silver packing does not say but think it is the silver and the blue facing inside the car. Ordered the standard and is plenty big with a nice square shape to fit up and down and across windshield with no sun getting in. Very lightweight and absolutely worth the price. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The price on these is low but there's a reason. First is the weak spring material that lets the shade hold it's shape when it's "deployed". I've had quite a lot of these types of shades over the years and this is the only one where I had to fold both sun visors down to keep it in place and even then sometimes it will slump down and fall. The other is the overall build quality. After only about a year of occasional use the spring tore through the material. I know I shouldn't complain since this was very cheap but honestly I wished I'd spent more for a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Aitchison

customer_reviews.title: Great, but room for betterment
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, packaging was great (although getting it small enough to put back into the packet isn't as easy as I originally thought it would be) for storage, it works like a dream. I live in Sunny San Diego and this provides enough shade to keep the car cool in non-tree areas. There was a plastic smell that disappeared after the first week of being used which I was grateful for as I don't like the smell of plastic. I would recommend this product and would purchase it again for a different vehicle. For improvement I would make the bag that stores the sunshade a little bigger by 1/2 inch or 1 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pro Shade Sunshield for car
customer_reviews.text: Regular size is for a sedan. New York City is having a very hot (90+ F) weekend, Sunday, Monday and Tuesday (June 11 - 13.) Lucky me, I received this sun-shield on Saturday (June 10.) Yes, my car in the driveway is fully protected from this killing heat. Meaning I don't have to roll down windows prior to start my car. Its circular spring does the magic. It easily helps putting tight against the windshield window interior, and is flexible to twist into a storage bag. The manufacturer or merchant sent me an instructional email. Quick delivery. Good product. Exceptional customer service. Purchase recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Charming

customer_reviews.title: This shade DOES NOT reach across the windshield of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This shade DOES NOT reach across the windshield of my late Ford pickup or my Lexus SUV. ALSO the hem was Coming apart up on taking it out of its wrapper. I needed this right away & haven't had time to stop & buy another & everything I reach up to put it in my windshield I get frustrated trying to get it to stay in the window using my extended visor - that the shade is so short that it be Doesn't reach, The minute I go buy a decent sun shade that fits & has strong enough metal stays, This one will be put in the envelope & returned. That is MY REVIEW.
customer_reviews.author: D. hilln

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: At first, based on the comments, I bought the smaller size for my small car. However, the pull down visors in my car are very small, so the smaller size shade didn't stay up. So then I both another, the large size. It was fine for about three weeks. At this point, the metal band has popped through the seems and it's unusable. I know own two unusable sunshades. I do like the fabric on this, and it does fold easily. I wish it was more durable.
customer_reviews.author: CJP Sac

customer_reviews.title: JUMBO is too small
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited by all the good reviews but when I attempted to put the Jumbo sized sunshade up this morning in my Mazda CX-7 it continuously fell down because the wire is so limp and flimsy. The Jumbo shade does not cover my entire windshield and left several holes where the sun is coming in. I will see how the heat factor is after work, but not at all happy with the struggle to keep repositioning it under the visors just to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the design AT ALL! It's very awkward fitting ( I tried it in two different vehicles) The two circle shades do not cover enough area and the floppy material around the circle just bunches up and flops over ; the only way to get it to hold is if you unhook your visors and push them forward on the windshield. Most of the time the shade slides down and the sun is exposed on top. Very poor design I do not recommend. Way too much work
customer_reviews.author: jmax

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: Received the standard size and it was too small for the windshield of my 2016 Nissan Maxima. Company replaced it with a jumbo size, no questions asked! Thats what I call 'good old American customer service. Don't understand some of the reviews when they say it's cheap, flimsy and doesn't work. Open it up, put the silver side up against the windshield and pull both visors down. It's not an air conditioner, it's a shade to prevent direct sunlight from baking the front interior of the vehicle too much. That plain, that simple!
customer_reviews.author: Vegas101

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunshade, arrived a day early and installs in about 5 seconds. It also folds up really easy as well. I had a similar shaped sunshade before but it was two separate pieces which had to be lined up correctly to fold properly. I have a black crossover with light grey/black interior and the GA sun really heats it up inside. This sunshade doesn't block all the heat of course but vehicle is a lot more tolerable to enter after sitting in the sun all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Langmann

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 stars. Good sunshade. Works as needed.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this sunshade 4 1/2 stars. I’ve been using this sunshade for about a week now at my office where I park in the direct sun. It really helps cut out the sunlight and keeps my Tahoe waaaaay cooler than without it up. It also keeps the sun off my dash and will hopefully prevent it from cracking. I knocked off a half a star due to the fact that I can’t quite get it around my rear view mirror. No matter what I do, there is always sunlight coming through.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Best sunshades I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I bought a second set of 4 of these shades. That’s how much I love them! I use all 4 on the front, rear and sides of my car...to block out the heat of the sun or to provide privacy. My purpose determines which side I install outward—silver reflective to reduce heat and sun or dark blue for privacy. These are well-constructed and high-quality shade!
customer_reviews.author: Pelipen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great in Phoenix
customer_reviews.text: This has done a great job keeping the inside of my vehicle cooler even through the contant 110+ degree heat all summer long in Phoenix, AZ. It's well made, thick material, easy to fold, and a perfect fit on a Gen 2 Dodge Durango. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great in the car and in bedroom windows for cutting heat
customer_reviews.text: Great total coverage in the car. I also got a couple of these for my bedroom window. It gets direct sunlight in the mornings and, with a dust allergy, curtains are not an option and I didn't want to put an adhesive sunblocker up. They block the light and heat very well and keep both the car and room noticeably cooler, especially the car steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya B.

customer_reviews.title: 3) folds up nice and small
customer_reviews.text: 1) I should have measured my car per the instructions, this was too small for my Mazda 3. I was surprised though based on feedback of other buyers. I did not think I had a large enough car to justify Jumbo. I would buy a jumbo size, but I don't see them for sale anymore. 2) I don't understand why everyone complains about needing the sun visors to hold it up. It's called "gravity". There is no magic that will hold something in place upside down on your windshield. It's also clearly written in thee instructions to use your visors to hold it up. 3) folds up nice and small.
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: Love the dark color
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I love the dark blue color and that was the main reason I made my first purchase. Turns out that it is Very well designed and so easy to use. We have two new vehicles and I want to protect the interior as best as possible. This shield is so easy to use, I actually do use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sunsheild for 2007 Toyota Corolla/ 2011 Camry
customer_reviews.text: Bought large for 2007 Toyota Corolla. Height is fine(approx.32"), but I do have some overlap of two rings. I also got one for my 2011 Camry that has wider windshield and seems to fit it better. One side is silver and the other blue. Hard to beat the price for sunshade($7.95/each). Good quality and should last years if not abused.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's truck. It stays outside and I'm hoping to keep the dashboard from cracking or peeling. Even though it's only March, we have already had temperatures in the 70's. You could tell a definite difference in the internal temperature of the truck. It was still cool inside when using the shade. I think it's a great buy, it fits nicely covering the entire window. Looking forward to a cooler summer using this!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B Racca

customer_reviews.title: A super buy!
customer_reviews.text: Turns out these windshields are a perfect fit for almost every size vehicle. I bought 2 and wasurprised how snug they were for a little Toyota carolla and a full size Lexus sedan. They are one piece as opposed to the comparable ones offered at AutoZone or Wal-Mart which were 2 separate pieces and kind of a headache to deal with. These just twist right up and go right back Into the storage sleeve. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lemonjello

customer_reviews.title: best pop up sunshade for 2003 saab 9-3
customer_reviews.text: out of Three sunshades that I have bought to fit my 2003 saab 9-3 this is the only one to work well, fit well, and appears to be durable. Very easy to collapse and open... its a must to use visors to hold any shade in place and this is no exception. The carry bag is cool but too difficult to stuff shade in multiple times a day... i just collapse the shade, use the elastic band to hold down and place in pocket behind passenger seat
customer_reviews.author: Brian Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: It works but
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit in my window very well. I consistently need to put down my passenger side visor in order to the protector to not fall down on the one side. You get what you pay for. If you don't mind being irritated every time you use this protector, go ahead and purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Abeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent customer service. I ordered two standard size. On for my 2015 Hyundai Genesis and one for my wife's 2016 Ford Fusion Titanium. The one for the Genesis fit great the ProShade did not fit the Fusion. I responded to an email I received from KD Brands about the shade not working in the Ford Fusion. Within in 24 hours I got a response and a larger ProShade at no cost to me (free) is being shipped as I write to review. I am very satisfied with the product and excellent customer service. Highy recommend this company. Perry
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product when I received it, but after only a week of use it started to tear up!!! Come on!! After only ONE WEEK? Geez. I'm attaching pictures as proof. Now I have to buy another one from another brand or something.
customer_reviews.author: Naikel

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out the sun great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, that’s why I bought for both cars. The outside edge needs to have the durable trim that goes all the way around it but it stops about 4 inches to soon and it’s just the material that extends out. The outer edge in drivers and passengers side window still lets in the sun. But for a universal shade, it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: keith king

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but dont forget to measure!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. I followed the sizing chart to ensure it would fit my trucks windshield. Either I measured wrong or the chart is off. It does still fit, but it is a little larger than my windshield. It does prevent my truck from heating up which is nice is Louisiana. It's also very easy to collapse quickly. All in all it's a great buy for the price. Just be very careful about what size you get.
customer_reviews.author: Motheroftwins

customer_reviews.title: Measure your window and check that your visor goes all the way to the window to hold it!
customer_reviews.text: Trust everyone when they say to measure your window. I have a sporty little elantra and thought that the regular size would surely fit my window. However, my visors don't go all the way to the window, so the shade kept slipping down. Not the product's fault, it was mine. I contacted the company and received excellent customer service and arranged a replacement within 5 minutes. The larger size is able to stay up in my window, even though I can't put my visor all the way down. Excellent product, but even better customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jess W

customer_reviews.title: The reflective properties of the material is quite good and it is very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The stitching ends around both the rods waere unraveling when I opened the package so I put a few threads over the existing stitching with a sewing machine at the exiting stitching terminations and a couple dabs of glue over those so the product will stay together as long as possible. I don't think I'll ever get the shade back into the little pocked bag it came in but it folds up O.K.. The reflective properties of the material is quite good and it is very lightweight. I like it- it is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Awesome affordable sunshade.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sunshade for my 2016 Camry. I got the extra large size and it fits very well. I just pull down the fold-able sun visor to keep it securely in place. So far my car has been kept cool thanks to this sunshade plus I have tinted windows on my car so with this sunshade nobody can see inside my car now. And another great thing is it helps my dash cam blend into the background. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: First window shade I bought didn't fit because I didn't look at the measurements. Too small. Emailed seller and he got right back to me and had me measure my window. He said he had bigger ones on order and would let me know when they arrive. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Doug emailed me right away when they arrived and I place my new order. Then he emailed me a couple days later to make sure all was good. The shade was exactly what I wanted and fit perfect. Thank you Doug for great customer service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps the sun out.
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of use and small storage size of this shade. Bought for my Silverado and it covers the entire windshield to protect my dash. Folds super easy and the price can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip E. Freiling

customer_reviews.title: Do your car and yourself a favor and get this Sunshield !
customer_reviews.text: It provides adequate protection from the hot Florida sun UV rays. The interior of my car (VW GTI) feels much cooler at the end of the work day parked on the open parking lot. It takes a little practice at first to fold it in the storage shape it's shipped at, but after a short while and a couple of tries you get the hang of it. Even easier to unfold open. Takes a second or two to unfold and less than a half a minute to put in place secured with the two visors in the down position. Do your car and yourself a favor and get this Sunshield !
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Great sun shade.love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great shade! Absolutely love it! I have a 2016 Cherokee and it's a little big for the windshield but still works. Man it remarkably reduces the temperature inside the car it's amazing! ! And it's light weight and I can fold it in like 5 sec(just twist it like an 8 and retract towards the middle on both hands to make it a small round pad and secure it with the band) Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Large means more material but small rings which do not help.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the cloth may be as stated for size, but the rings are much smaller and they will not stay in your windshield. I have bought the two sizes and neither one will work. The smaller one is the correct size but the rings are too small to stay in the windshield. The larger one is yes, larger material but the rings are still much smaller and they will not stay in the windshield either. Their is substantial amount of additional material but it just falls down...disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Oney/ Tiffany's Body Shop

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed car shade. It is very flexible allowing it to fit various size & shaped car windows. It is easy to install on the car and works well. It is a little tricky to fold it back up, but the YouTube video will show you how it is done and then it is very quick to fold.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shade, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see this shade as I have had a similar style for my truck for over seven years and have not been able to find this style available for my car in stores. It arrived quickly, was a great fit, and dropped the temperature in my car considerably. I was terribly disappointed when after just two weeks of use the seems tore and the frame wire stuck out of the fabric. I love the style of the product and its effectiveness, but poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: 1paw

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: It's a sunshade that works. Folding it up is a piece of cake. But what really impressed me was the customer service I received when the original shade I bought was too small for my car. Despite my best efforts to measure and match sizes the shade wouldn't stay in place, even with the visors down. It took one email to explain my problem and in less than an hour got a response that the next size up was in the mail! Absolutely no hassle and the larger fits perfect! I would highly recommend this seller to anyone looking for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the questions section of the product page, the appropriate size for my 2014 Camry is standard. Sooo. Thats what i ordered. And annoyingly enough, this sunshade does not hold up unless i completely remove the visor and slide down onto the actual windshield. Its light and not intrusive when not in use, but I live in a city where its damn hot and sunny all the time and I pull that thing out at least half a dozen times in a day and i really dislike having to dislodge the visors every time.
customer_reviews.author: Just B

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO CUMBERSOME & POOR FIT
customer_reviews.text: First, it was too large for windshield (2016 Outback). That wasn't so bad because I could make it fit the space. This produce was just to cumbersome to use. It can take up to 2 minutes put in place against the windshield. It may take longer to take it down and bend and fold it into a storable shape. This might seem minor, but after the tenth episode that belief will change. Btw, the smaller one is too small for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: QuietStorm10475

customer_reviews.title: Need the big size even for compact SUVs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smaller size and it did not fit my Honda CRV. It was too small. The seller contacted me and offered to send me the larger size. I was impressed by the attention and customer service. If you have a Honda CRV, make sure you buy the large size. The small size will slide down and will not fit on your windshield. It fold up easily and fits into a small case which is convenient to store under your seat. Once I got the right size, this product worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a shade screen for my vehicle that is easy to put up and completely blocks out the sun. THANK YOU for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Cooler car, and pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the thin silver-colored sunshield I had before. It keeps my car a bit cooler and really isn't hard to install. You just have to fit it around the rear view mirror. I put the visors down too but that's not really necessary if you fit it on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Fishbaum

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit though
customer_reviews.text: Really??!! Had it two days and the stitching starting coming apart. The metal ring was exposed. Tried to fix, but can't get it into sewing machine. Nice fit though! Too bad it's falling apart. OK, a few days after posting my review, I was extremely pleased to have received a phone call from the vendor. Had a very pleasant question and answer period and they are replacing the Sunshade with another that is an upgrade in design and fabric. What a concept, I start up that understands customer service. Might just have to buy one for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: J Paul M

customer_reviews.title: This sunshade is easy to use and it is great because it covered ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade is easy to use and it is great because it covered so much area. Aside from the two stiff circles on each side the flexible fabric around it allows me to make sure every inch of my windshield is covered. It really makes a big difference for my car and I'll be using it all year long. I was confused about the sizing but I got an extra large for my 2015 Mazda3 and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: M. ITO

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS. It really does make the car cooler
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. It really does make the car cooler. I use it constantly. Per others' review of the sizing, I ordered a size up for a Corolla. I think the 'correct' size would have been fine, but the size up overlaps such that it's a nice tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a Honda CRV 2012
customer_reviews.text: The "Extra Large" size was a good, snug fit for a Honda CRV 2012. The shade stays in place when you put the visors down. Each of the two stiff rings is oval-shaped and measures about 35.5 inches tall by 29.5 inches wide. Admittedly, this style of shade is not as easy to fold up as an accordion-style shade, but I haven't been able to find an accordion-style shade that is tall enough to be held in place by the visors. So, I just fold the Pro Shade in half once and toss it in the back seat without collapsing it fully.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Might want to size up...
customer_reviews.text: **** update***** got the jumo size and works perfect in my chevy avalanche. Fits so tight, i dont have to pull my visors down to hold it in place. Can feel a slight temp differance and things arent as hot to the touch as the used to bee. Cheep insurance if i want ur interior to look nice longer. Standard doesn't fit a 2012 Chevy avalanche very well, returning stand for a jumbo and will re-review then. Looks good and stows easy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Thin! Very Flimsy!!
customer_reviews.text: Updated after 3 weeks of use. Went from 2 stars to 1 star. Works okay once you get them up, but very thin and cheaply made. Does not fit standard windshield like advertised- as it doesn't stay! You have to spend a little time strategically propping it behind your visors. I was really disappointed. You could probably get something better at an auto part store for less!
customer_reviews.author: C.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just get the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunshade! Keeps my car nice and cool, folds up compact enough for me to tuck it away in the glove compartment and is definitely worth a lot more than what they are charging for this product. Setting it up takes a bit of practice though. Because it does not have rigid corners it kinda flops around since the rings are the only structural support that this shade is getting. I got the Standard Size for my 2014 Civic LX but it is a tiny bit too small for my liking (Nothing a little visor positioning and practice couldn't fix). I would recommend this to anyone looking to buy a sunshade, just make sure you get the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soto

customer_reviews.title: It's okay- not great, but okay
customer_reviews.text: This product in no way looks as smooth as the pictured shade. It looks saggy and wrinkled in real life making my new car look cheesy. Yes, it does stay up and protect your car from harmful sun rays and provides a good amount of shade, I just wish it looked more attractive. It does easily fold into the little pouch that comes with the product. It easily stores under the seat for later use. I think this product is only worth about 7 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to fold once you learn how to do it but it's way too thin to block much, if any sunlight for the summertime. I'd invest in something thicker if you have hotter summers like the ones in TX.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shades
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived very quick in a good condition . It fits well on a mid size car and so far it has been very functional . It comes with a storage pouch ( very handy )
customer_reviews.author: AIR1ELF

customer_reviews.title: I like the silver and blue
customer_reviews.text: Product works as promised. Purchased for Mazda CX5 and it fits perfectly. I like the silver and blue. Itis still spring here but it definitely helps keep temp down and protects dash and steering wheel from hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: LCT

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality sunshade for the price. I have a Toyota Corolla iM and the Large size fits perfectly. It stays in place really well for hours at a time and I've noticed a large difference in the inside temperature of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa F.

customer_reviews.title: Probably works but looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product probably works, I haven't used it more than 3x because it is not nice looking. I have a beautiful car and putting this in the window makes it look so cheap. The material is baggy around the edges no matter how much I fiddle with it, and it does not stay up without the visors.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: When I got this in the mail. with in days of ordering it. before I put it in my SUV I painted a picture scene on it. I get people asking me in parking lots where i got it! lol I tell them Pro Shade threw Amazon - but the picture is all mine. It fits my SUV perfect and on these super hot days we are having it does it's job. I love not burning my legs on the seats anymore!
customer_reviews.author: MsB

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, fits my car well.
customer_reviews.text: I've always preferred the sunshades like this, with the two rings linked by fabric, but my old one was too small for my new car and kept falling out. Can't seem to find this type in the stores anymore, however. This fits nicely and stays compactly in the drivers door pocket. Works as it should, not much else to say. Update 8/20/17: the stitching that retains the wire came out of one area after a few months of use. Lowering my rating to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reisman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this sunshield. Received it timely and find it fits my Toyota Camry (2006) quite well. Definitely keeps my car cooler in my sun drenched driveway. The fact that it folds so easily into its own case is an added bonus, I pop it into the passenger door side pocket, it takes up very little room. I would recommend this product for its reasonable cost and effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: shamrock

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunshield I have found so far. It looks like it is finished better than any of the others I have tried. Living in south Florida makes a product like this a necessity. The extra large fits my 2017 CR-V perfectly after trying several others that were too small. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J D 8501

customer_reviews.title: Very much too large
customer_reviews.text: I measured my window and ordered the size, but it's very large and is hard to fold & unfold.
customer_reviews.author: MKL

customer_reviews.title: ... type of windshield sunshade for awhile and was very happy to have come across this one
customer_reviews.text: We have looking for this type of windshield sunshade for awhile and was very happy to have come across this one, it is similar to the one we already have for one car. I am so satisfied with this product and am reordering another one to replace the old one. Our vehicles are the Escape and Fiesta and the JUMBO fits perfect in each. I don't understand why some people would complain about the product and not able to open and close it; it is soooo simple.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Proshade is a great value. Just make sure you get right size!
customer_reviews.text: The ProShade Sunshade item is incredibly convenient since it folds up and is ultra light. Didn't want to give in 5 stars because it is cumbersome and I am sure it would not fit all car models as suggested. there is no way to really fix it in place on the dash as well. It is a really good idea. I just with there was a way to adjust it to the windshield. I usually just use the rear view and the visors to hold it loosely in place.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, good quality. I measured the windshield in my Hyundai Accent to determine which size to buy. I got the extra large and it's way too big. I'm making it work but I sure wish I had ordered a large.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara W.

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: The sunshade I ordered fits well on the front window of my 2016 Hyundai Tucson. It would also fit the window of our 2012 Silverado pickup. I'm very pleased. The quality is fine and the sunshade does exactly what it's supposed to do; keep the interior of my car cooler. It folds up easily and tucks into the cargo net at the back of the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great
customer_reviews.text: Our new Sentra has a super deep windshield, and this shield doesn't completely cover everything. And the car is not quite as cool as I expected with all of the sun being blocked (I place the shield silver side out). That said, it's very easy to use, should fit any but the largest windshields, and is vastly better than having no shield at all! It folds easily, and I can stick it in between the seats for stowage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Customer Service!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Previously I wrote a bad review on this product because it was too small and didn't fit in my windshield, however the company read the review and gave me a call, they were very nice they offered to refund my purchase AND send me a jumbo windshield free of charge! I thought that was very nice of them, so I'm changing my review as my experience with the product has improved. The new windshield shade fits my car perfectly. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Great SunShade!
customer_reviews.text: I own a Kia Optima 14 and ordered the Jumbo as per the companies suggestion. Yes, at first it feels really cheap, and it was a pain in the neck to get it to roll back up into the little pouch, but you will get the hang of it afterwards. I had a chance to try it out on a 80 degree day, and I have to say my car was comfortable! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up fine with your visors
customer_reviews.text: Does what it supposed to do. If you're looking for your car to be significantly cooler, this wont help... nothing will. This isn't designed for that. This will keep your dashboard protected from the sun and from fading. Holds up fine with your visors, good material but the stitching could use some reinforcement hence the deduction of a star. Otherwise, this is a great product and I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Skoundrianos

customer_reviews.title: The right quality at this price.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this item. It does a pretty good job of blocking out the sun but you have to use your sun visors to hold it up. Higher quality ones hold themselves up, which I feel is nicer. I give it 4 stars because the quality of craftsmanship is low. There was a bunch of thread and stitching coming apartment as soon as I removed it from its packaging. I have to cut off some thread at least once a week but again, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Berj Aliksanian

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this style of windshield sunshades all over. I made the mistake of buying the jumbo one first for my 2003 Toyota 4Runner. I should of just looked for my car in the pics, I would of bought the standard. The standard fits perfect for my 4Runner as the pic states. I gave the Jumbo to a family member. They love it as well. It works perfect and blocks out the whole windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was insisting I get a sun-shield for our car, I didn't want one so kept putting it off. I finally relented, and went on Amazon and picked this one. It's great! It really does keep the interior cool even in our 90+ degree weather we have been having. It's easy to put in and easy to put away in the little bag. I love it and use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: VIVI

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well. Only thing is
customer_reviews.text: I bought the standard size for my Tesla Model S. It works pretty well. Only thing is, the picture makes it look like a pretty solid rectangle. However, the frame is made of two ovals as you can see, so it's not as rigid of a sunshield as I expected. Still, it keeps the sun and heat out and works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Honda Odessey
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for a Honda Odyssey. Even though when I search for a windshield shade for that specific Van, and I chose the largest one they had, it does not work. It is too flimsy on the sides and does not stay up. I had to give it away and I am not sure if my friend likes it or not, but I am sure it works fine for a shade. Nothing out of the ordinary. It arrived on time and no damage. It folds easy enough, although I know some people do not like those twist fold shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shade. Very light and easy to put away
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shade. Very light and easy to put away. I want to leave an added star for customer service from the vendor. When I ordered I decided not to measure my window even though it was recommended (since I have a car). Upon getting my shade I found it was too small. I emailed the company immediately and they instantly gave me the larger size. Super customer service which rarely happens these days. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Good sunshade, but...
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade is made with good quality. However, it may fit better for larger vehicles. I ordered a standard one for my Kia Optima. It didn't stay in place even after using the mirrors in the front of the car for support. The sunshade will protect the car from the sun or UV rays, just not completely due to its inability to cover the entire windshield and its inability to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Neesie24

customer_reviews.title: Must have accessory for your car on hot summer days!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sun shade for my older Toyota Camry. After reading the reviews I was convinced that this is a worthy investment for anybody who want to keep their car cooler when parked in the sun, especially on those hot summer days. Things I love about this product 1. Size fits perfectly for 2001 Toyota Camry. 2. Very light, flexible, quality material which takes 2 seconds to set up and take down. 3. Comes with a nice nifty bag for storage. 4. Does the job!!! Especially if you are like me and have to park the car on the street under direct sunlight. I Have used it everyday since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Deepword

customer_reviews.title: The large was the best fit, for my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 2015 Sonata limited. The large was the best fit, for my vehicle. Item seems well made and sturdy, good customer service. So far it seems to be doing its intended job.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: ... do change - and as to this for the better - fits great and the fabric it is made ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replaced one I had for over 10 years - Man things do change - and as to this for the better - fits great and the fabric it is made of is real nice
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great sunshade, and the best style I think you can buy...
customer_reviews.text: This shade is exactly what my wife and I were looking for. Those sold in the stores are not as high of quality as this one, and we were very particular about wanting the kind that folds up so that you can put it in the map pocket of the door. My wife and I love these, and we'll buy from this seller again when we are ready for another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Black

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this sun shade. It folds down to nothing and easily fits into my windshield. During these hot Virginia summers it has been a life saver. Great product and so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: monkeybutt

customer_reviews.title: Decent fabric. Today's tip: Practice refolding in your living room
customer_reviews.text: Decent fabric. Today's tips: 1-Practice refolding in your living room. 2- Never lose the case bag. Takes some trial and error, makes sense when folded right. Amusing to others during early failed folding attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Good alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly awkward to insert but otherwise good product. We debated between getting a shield designed specifically for our car or one that was universal and far less expensive. We opted for the less expensive one. Glad we did. Seems to do the job. While I have not personally taken it out, my DH has and says it is easy to fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: very thick and sturdy, should last a long tim, easy to fold up and store in seat back pocket
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen for your car
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunshade I have ever bought. I'm glad I took the chance on this sunscreen. Keeps the car cool, easy to use. I live in Florida and the sun is intense. I wish it came in a larger size so I could buy one for my husband's car. I drive a smaller car and it fits great, definitely will not fit a Firebird 😔😔
customer_reviews.author: SempreDomani

customer_reviews.title: Sunshades
customer_reviews.text: I've used this sunshades 1 in my car and 1 in my truck and as far as the size is concerned, I find it perfect. It covers very well and it does make a difference in the vehicles temperature. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I think the product will be a lot better if it was thicker. But overall, it's a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Thin material, but good size.
customer_reviews.text: The size is good and it does what it is supposed to. I have 2 or 3 other sun shades 1) is too small, 2) 2 sets, big but in 2 pieces. The old ones I have are all much thicker and better quality. This one is kinda thin. I wonder how long we will have it before there is a rip or tear. If I can remember and we get a problem I will try to edit my review.
customer_reviews.author: john P

customer_reviews.title: Works on Honda Fit and is easy to fold!
customer_reviews.text: This extra large sun shield is the only one I found for under $50 that covers the huge windshield window on my 2017 Honda Fit. It's too wide but it easily overlaps to fit. But the best thing is that it is easy to fold! I can never fold those twisty sun shields but this one is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ann Dodson, LCSW

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This isn't worth purchasing. There isn't any reduction in the cab temperature. It is also difficult to fold it into it's pocket holder.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope S. Balint

customer_reviews.title: too small for 2016 Hyundai Elantra GT Hatchback
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Hyundai Elantra GT Hatchback and this is too small for the windsheild (which i consider to be average). I have to positition it just right and even then it falls sometimes -- kinda sad over it bc i love how easy it is to store and throw onto my dash. iIl have to get a larger one
customer_reviews.author: Ransom Note

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sun Shade
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been looking for a folding one-piece sun shade ever since our old one wore out. Finally we found it. This is a great product, fits our Westfalia van perfect, offers a great price, and the company gives terrific service. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: MALowe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: It's hot here in Texas that's why I bought this to protect my dashboard and reduce the heat inside my vehicle. So far it's working... it's not that hot when I open the door after my vehicle has been parked outside for hours. Good thing I bought the jumbo as it just fits OK with my Nissan Rogue. The smaller size would have been a pain to keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: hdy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far! I have a 2010 VW Jetta - the standard size sunshield fits well. The circles overlap slightly in the middle, but there's enough extra fabric to do so and still work. I tuck the middle fabric behind the rearview mirror and fold down the visors over the stiff circles to keep it in place. It's definitely helping during this HOT Los Angeles summer.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage. Doesn't fall down like most and doesn't need anything to hold it up. I like that both sides are already connected.
customer_reviews.author: BWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well it works, but it does keep the sun out. Can be a little tricky to get back in the bag, but the directions are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA COHEN

customer_reviews.title: This shade fits my 5th Gen (2017) Toyota 4Runner
customer_reviews.text: This shade fits my 5th Gen (2017) Toyota 4Runner. It tucks in tight to the sides of the windshield and under the visors. I would highly recommend it for anything with a 5th Gen 4Runner.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gundrum

customer_reviews.title: Clunky, won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: Kinda clunky, compared to others I've used. I bought the larger size, even though my window was in the middle of the two sizes. (Glad I did, because otherwise it would have been too small.) But it still won't stay up unless I put the visors down, to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Zader

customer_reviews.title: fits great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have a Mercury Mountaineer, I ordered the Jumbo size and it fits my car perfectly. The shield comes with a case that it fits in when you fold it after use. It is a little tricky to figure out how to refold at first, but once you get the hang of it it's really easy.
customer_reviews.author: mama of 2

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good coverage and fit
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and is large enough to not fall down. Other kinds I have gotten before (such as the accordion style) are sometimes too short and fall down during the day. That kind has also fallen apart on me over time, but this one appears to be very durable and will last for a while. I also like that it is one connected piece instead of two separate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this sunshade would be better after seeing the high star rating, but it's a lot thinner and flimsier than I expected (especially for the price). Also, the photo leads you to believe the shade will fit snugly against the windshield without the help of the visors, but it definitely does not fit like that in our truck (2014 Chevy Silverado).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

product_meta.title: Pro Shade SUNSHIELD UV Reflecting Fabric Car Sun Windshield Protector, Extra Large
product_meta.description:
THE IMPORTANCE OF PROTECTION

UV rays are not only incredibly harmful to the skin and eyes, but run the risk of damaging your vehicle as well. Protect your valuable investments using the PROSHADE sunshade. Our special UV resistant technology keeps your car cool and comfortable on hot sunny days. Our specially designed 210T fabric is thicker than other leading sunshades on the market to better protect your car’s interior from the damage of UV rays. Trust PROSHADE to keep you and your vehicle protected.

DON’T RISK THE DAMAGE

When you insert a PROSHADE sunshade into your car's windows, you are protecting it against light and heat damage from the sun. No more cracking! No more fading! Keep the interior of your vehicle looking and feeling like new and feel confident that your investment is protected with PROSHADE.

DESIGNED FOR EASY INSTALLATION

Save time, money and energy with our easy to use PROSHADE sunshades. Application is easy:

1. Place the open sunshade against the interior of the windshield

2. Position the fabric along the edge of the windshield so that none of the windshield is visible

3. Flip down the sun visors to keep the sunshade in place

A FIT FOR EVERY VEHICLE

Our designers worked tirelessly to make a product that was as effective as it was easy to use. That's why the PROSHADE sunshade is made to fit in a wide variety of cars: including Vans, Trucks, Compact Cars, and SUVS! We advise our customers to measure their windows before purchasing to ensure the perfect fit. Our shades are easily adjustable and incredibly versatile.

CLICK ADD TO CART NOW - Buy Today RISK FREE During Our Limited Time SALE - Supplies Will Run Out
feature_bullets: ⚡⚡⚡MEASURING REQUIRED - Please measure your windshield height (down the middle): if under 27 inches order STANDARD, if between 27 and 33 inches order LARGE, and if over 33 inches order EXTRA LARGE⚡⚡⚡

✅TEMPERATURE REGULATING - The interior of a car left exposed to the sun can heat up to 20°F or more than its surrounding environment. The Pro Shade keeps the sun out while maintaining a comfortable temperature in your car throughout the day
✅EASY SETUP - The Pro Shade pops out and folds back up in seconds making it convenient for daily use
✅NO HASSLE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We know you'll love our Pro Shade, that's why if you aren't 100% satisfied we will provide you with a refund or a free replacement - whichever you prefer
